message.name: ERR_MOD_STARTDATE_AFTER_ENDDATE
message.locale: The End Date must be later than or equal to the Start Date.

message.name: ERR_ADD_STARTDATE_AFTER_ENDDATE
message.locale: The End Date cannot be earlier than the Start Date.

message.name: LINK_REC_REMOVED
message.locale: The association between this condition and determination configuration has already been removed.

message.name: ERR_CONDITION_DETERMINATION_ACTIVE_LINK_EXIST
message.locale: The condition has already been associated to this determination configuration for this period.

message.name: ERR_CONDITION_ACTIVE_LINK_EXIST_DIFF_DETERMINTION
message.locale: This condition is already associated to another determination configuration for this period.

message.name: ERR_CONDITIONDCLINK_CONDITION_COMBINATION_ALREADY_ASSIGN_TO_OTHER_DETERMINATIONCONFIG
message.locale: This combination of conditions is already associated with another determination configuration.

message.name: ERR_CONDITIONDCLINK_REMOVE_ASSOCIATION_COMBINATION_SAME_AS_OTHER_DETERMINATIONCONFIG
message.locale: Removing this condition will result in a combination of conditions which are the same as that of %1s.
